sentences: Aegade jooksul on toimunud palju muutusi.
Ta on aegade üks populaarsemaid lauljaid.
Aegade parimad sportlased on võitnud palju medaleid.
context: The word 'aegade' is used in Estonian to refer to a period of time or an era, and it can be translated to English as 'of the times' or 'of all time', depending on the context in which it is used.
